title: How to Care for 5 Days Old Chicks #business #chicken #homesteading

tasks.task: Feeding and caring for baby chickens
subtasks: Collecting and handling water and feed pans
Checking and adjusting temperature for brooding area
Feeding the chickens nutritious crumble feed
Ensuring proper ventilation in the brooding area
Adding and replacing treated paper or sawdust
Daily cleaning of the brooding area
Transferring chickens to larger areas when necessary
